snippet: The progressive country and western songwriter and singer performed in a club-style setting after a PowerPoint presentation.
abstract: The progressive country and western songwriter and singer performed in a club-style setting after a PowerPoint presentation.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT -- As the first day of press previews came to an end on Monday night, in an antiseptic conference room on the second floor of the Cobo Center, music broke out. The Panasonic Automotive Systems Company of America decided to sweeten the appeal of the company's press conference by presenting John Hiatt, the progressive country and western songwriter and singer known for songs about cars and the roads. He was also promoting his own product, his latest CD called "Dirty Jeans and Mudslide Hymns."

headline.main: John Hiatt Performs Songs for the Road at Panasonic Press Event
